item.title: The Danger of a Single Story
item.description:
Dublin Core

Title

The Danger of a Single Story

Subject

Hidden Curriculum

Description

Ted Talk by Chimamanda Adichie- discusses growing up in Lagos Nigeria and how not seeing herself in children's books taught her about her place in literature. She explores the danger of having a "single story" about a person or culture.

Source

https://www.ted.com/talks/chimamanda_adichie_the_danger_of_a_single_story#t-42395
